department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch: 引導研究所學生閱讀國際期刊並進行遙測領域研究。協助並促進學生深入討論與展示研究成果的能力。
goal.en: “Assist the students to engage in advanced studies, read journal articles, and conduct scientific investigation. Improve the students‘ ability to communicate with people in similar research area and to present scientific findings in both oral and poster format.“

outline.ch: 兩次口頭報告及一次海報展示。對於期刊論文及個人研究內容進行深入討論。
outline.en: Two rounds of oral presentations and one poster exhibition. Discussions about journal articles and individual research.

textbook.ch: 國際期刊與相關參考書

gradMethod.ch: 口頭報告、海報展示、書面報告及課程參與度
gradMethod.en: “Oral presentation, poster exhibition written report, and interaction in class.“

ch.competencies: 遙測與空間資訊專業能力

en.competencies: Professional competence in remote sensing and geoinformatics

ch: 系所:限遙測科技碩士學位學程。年級:限二年級。
en: Department:Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology only.Year:Second Year only.
